name: even-prettier
description: VS Code extension based off of Prettier but with more customization
author: James Zhang

prettier.printWidth.description: Fit code within this line limit

prettier.tabWidth.description: Number of spaces it should use per tab

prettier.singleQuote.description: If true, will use single instead of double quotes

prettier.jsxSingleQuote.description: If true, will use single instead of double quotes in JSX

prettier.trailingComma.description: Controls the printing of trailing commas wherever possible

prettier.bracketSpacing.description: Print spaces between brackets in array literals

prettier.bracesSpacing.description: Print spaces between brackets in object literals

prettier.breakProperty.description: Allow object properties to break lines between the property name and its value

prettier.arrowParens.description: Always put parentheses on arrow function arguments

prettier.arrayExpand.description: Expand arrays into one item per line

prettier.flattenTernaries.description: Format ternaries in a flat style

prettier.breakBeforeElse.description: Put else clause in a new line

prettier.jsxBracketSameLine.description: If true, puts the `>` of a multi-line jsx element at the end of the last line instead of being alone on the next line

prettier.noSpaceEmptyFn.description: Omit space before empty anonymous function body

prettier.semi.description: Print semicolons at the ends of statements

prettier.spaceBeforeFunctionParen.description: Put a space before function parenthesis

prettier.alignObjectProperties.description: Align colons in multiline object literals. Does nothing if object has computed property names.

prettier.statusBar.description: Display Prettier status in the bottom bar

prettier.openOutput.description: Automatically opens Prettier output when an error is detected

prettier.autoScroll.description: Scroll automatically to line where error has been detected

prettier.javascriptEnable.description: Advanced feature. Enable Prettier parser for JavaScript.

prettier.typescriptEnable.description: Advanced feature. Enable Prettier parser for TypeScript.

prettier.cssEnable.description: Advanced feature. Enable Prettier parser for styling files.

prettier.jsonEnable.description: Advanced feature. Enable Prettier parser for JSON.

prettier.graphqlEnable.description: Advanced feature. Enable Prettier parser for GraphQL.
